job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of integrating AI features into a complete product, spanning both front-end and back-end development.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the traditional software development task of building web applications with integrated AI components.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle ownership, a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the integration aspect of the role, emphasizing that AI work is part of a larger product, aligning with software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the expectation of full-stack development and integration, a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software development process of translating ideas into products, a core SE task, with the added complexity of AI integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to working with AI models (LLMs) to create new tools and features, fitting the definition of model development and innovation.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of developing AI applications aimed at improving learning, which falls under the umbrella of AI model application and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the impact on users and the alignment with educational technology standards, indicating an understanding of the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes working with stakeholders to meet user needs, a key aspect of business understanding and aligning technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: This statement focuses on the strategic aspect of building new, innovative applications rather than routine maintenance, aligning with business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with a diverse team.

job_tasks.phrase: Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the importance of clear and effective communication.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes collaboration with various roles to ensure impactful solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly speaks to the need for continuous learning and applying new advancements.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights taking full responsibility for the product.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes taking ownership and driving technical projects.

Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.

taking ownership of the entire product.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (full-stack development, integration, ownership of the development process) categorized under Macro-Category A. While it mentions working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude (Macro-Category B tasks), the primary focus is on integrating these AI capabilities into broader web applications rather than deep model development or specialization. The role is described as 'not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development' and requires integrating AI 'across both front-end and back-end systems', indicating that AI is a feature within a larger software product. This aligns best with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, where the core is software engineering, augmented by AI integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the expectations for the role, explicitly stating the blend of full-stack development with AI integration. It also clearly defines what the role is NOT, which helps in precise classification. The mention of specific LLMs and the emphasis on product ownership and integration provide strong evidence for the assigned profile.
